page.content: workforce for{Letchworth}and{ {Stevenage}.Stotfold itself has also encouraged some industries to develope in the town. {FEASTS AND FAIRS. Stotfold holds a carnival annually in June.It is called{The Feast.}Each group prepares a'float'on the back of a borrowed lorry or trailer.This year floats depicted pirates,atlantis, circus and the olympics etc.The'floats 'tour the village from The Green to the Recreation Ground arriving at 3pm. The rest of the afternoon is spent on stalls. { The Fair. { } The Fair comes to the green in Stot Fold 3 times a year.There are the usual side shows including coconut shies and candy floss.The main rides are the Waltzer,Thriller and the Dodgems.It costs between 25_35p a go.
